system.description:
You have learned innovative new ways of combining the gifts of your patron and the powers of your conviction. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Lay on Hands pool increases by 2 for every warlock level you have.

  • Half of your herald levels (rounded down) count as warlock levels for the purpose of determining which invocations you can take.

  • Half of your warlock levels (rounded down) count as herald levels for the purpose of determining how much damage your Divine Smite does.

  • Choose an organization or a specific creature type other than humanoid that you and/or your patron have particular animus toward. Creatures of that type or from that organization now register to your Divine Sense, regardless of which Divine Sense option you selected. You can change this organization or creature type to a new one when you finish a long rest, but only once every 7 days.
